==Useful Info==
'''Gelid demonspawn''' are demonspawn with 10 extra points of [[AC]] thanks to their [[Icemail]] passive ability. They can be found in the [[Pandemonium]] and guarding it's portals.

==Tips & Tricks==
Since they are not particularly different from a normal demonspawn, just with Icemail and a resistance to cold, use fire attacks on them, since their Icemail will melt, leaving them rather weak. Like all demonspawn, they are also vulnerable to holy weapons and [[silver]], so use those if you have them.

==History==
*Monstrous, gelid, infernal, and torturous demonspawn were removed in [[0.28]].
*Gelid demonspawn were added in [[0.14]].
